description:
MNews is a webOS portal app to access Malaysian online news sites. The font size is formatted for use on a Palm Pre/Palm Pre Plus.
The app is also released for users not only in Malaysia, but anywhere in the world who want mobile access to Malaysian news. The bulk of the content is in English but there are also news sites in Malay and Chinese.
This app is dedicated to all Malaysian/Singaporean webOS users and die-hard Palm fans from the region. While the old Palm glory days may be over, we eagerly await HP Palm's and webOS' re-birth in AsiaPac.
